side_effects.text: Excessive pornography consumption can lead to desensitization and reduced satisfaction in real relationships.
Frequent masturbation may cause fatigue, low energy, and a decrease in motivation over time.
Watching porn regularly can distort perceptions of intimacy and create unrealistic expectations in relationships.
Excessive masturbation can lead to dopamine imbalances, potentially causing anxiety and mood swings.
Compulsive porn use can contribute to social withdrawal and isolation from real-world connections.
Overstimulation from porn can lead to erectile dysfunction (PIED) in some individuals.
Porn addiction can result in decreased focus, productivity, and interest in personal goals.
Excessive masturbation may lead to physical discomfort, such as soreness or irritation.
Watching extreme content can escalate over time, leading to addiction and dependency.
Porn use may interfere with emotional connections, making it harder to form meaningful relationships.
